title: Client issues
body: If i stay in queue for too long, my client just stops working. queues dont pop

replies.body: When you are queued for a match, the server is attempting to put everyone together into the same group.  If you have a network issue, then the server may not respond at all and leave you behind.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
